definition: the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
to fly
moth
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
surname Huo

sentences.chinese: 我祈祷着飞蛾扑火的毁灭。

sentences.english: I love your fire like moths irresistible.
sentences.chinese: 我对你的爱就像飞蛾扑火不可抗拒。

sentences.english: A moth, a few people can do.
sentences.chinese: 飞蛾扑火，有几人能做到。

sentences.english: If you'er the rock, i still crush against.
sentences.chinese: 即使你心如磐石，我仍愿飞蛾扑火。

sentences.english: I can't predict where it ends, if you are the rock I'll crush against.
sentences.chinese: 纵使结局无法预料，我仍旧甘愿飞蛾扑火。

definition: lit. like a moth flying into the fire (idiom); fig. to choose a path to certain destruction
to dash on bravely with no thought of personal safety (idiom); undaunted by dangers/regardless of perils
reckless/regardless of everything
one falls, the next follows (idiom); stepping into the breach to replace fallen comrades/advancing wave upon wave
to advance dauntlessly in wave upon wave (idiom)
honor does not allow one to glance back (idiom); duty-bound not to turn back/no surrender/to pursue justice with no second thoughts
to meet death
bravery with no thought of personal safety (idiom); risking life and limb/undaunted by perils
to court disaster (idiom)/to dig one's own grave
to stake all on one throw
a mantis trying to stop a chariot (idiom)/to overrate oneself and attempt sth impossible/also written 螳臂擋車|螳臂挡车[tang2 bi4 dang3 che1]
see 一往無前|一往无前[yi1 wang3 wu2 qian2]
to sever all relations with sb/determined/decisive
to be madly in love
pinyin: ai4 de5 si3 qu4 huo2 lai2

definition: lit. to strike a stone with egg (idiom); to attempt the impossible/to invite disaster by overreaching oneself

place sb on a field of death and he will fight to live (idiom based on Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to fight desperately when confronting mortal danger/fig. to find a way out of an impasse
pinyin: zhi4 zhi1 si3 di4 er2 hou4 sheng1
